des:
Important! This skill is for PowerView Gen 3 only. If you have PowerView Gen 2 shades, use the PowerView Gen 2 Scenes skill. Please visit help.hunterdouglas.com for information on determining which version of PowerView you have.

To get started, please ensure you have the proper hardware and accessories. Please contact an authorized Hunter Douglas dealer if you have any questions.

PowerView® Gen 3 Automation merges seamlessly with Alexa to bring enhanced operation of popular Hunter Douglas window coverings to your connected lifestyle. 
 
The PowerView Gen 3 skill for Amazon Alexa allows you to voice-activate individual shades, Rooms of shades, or specific PowerView Scenes created in the PowerView® App.

Simply speak “Alexa" followed by the activation words "Activate", "Open", or "Close", and then the shade name, Room, or PowerView® Scene name.

Some example phrases are:

Individual Shade Command Examples
"Alexa, Open Bedroom Left."
“Alexa, Set Kitchen Right tilt to 50 percent.”

Room Command Examples
"Alexa, Close Living Room."

Scene Command Examples
"Alexa, Activate 'I'm Leaving.'"
“Alexa, Run “Movie Night.”

Below are some tips for success when voice-activating PowerView Automation using the PowerView Automation skill for Alexa:

- Make sure Shade names, Rooms, and Scene names are unique
- Make your Shade names, Rooms, and Scene names easy to pronounce
-Use Routines to combine multiple shades, Rooms of shades, or specific PowerView Scenes with other devices for whole-home automation

In order to use the PowerView Automation skill for Alexa to voice-activate your PowerView shades, you'll need the following:

Account Requirements: PowerView® Account with a PowerView Gateway (account setup and Gateway setup in the PowerView app. This ensures seamless account linking with Alexa. 

For more information on Hunter Douglas PowerView® Automation products visit: www.hunterdouglas.com/operating-systems/powerview-motorization
